survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Co-Living Spaces
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from residents of co-living spaces to evaluate their satisfaction with amenities, community, and overall living experience.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness of shared spaces in your co-living facility?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistent measurement. Ensure mobile-friendly dropdown for answer options.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness of shared spaces in your co-living facility?

questions.question_text: Which of the following amenities do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multi-select for accurate usage patterns. Randomize option order to reduce bias.

script.question_text: Which of the following amenities do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the community events organized in your co-living space?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the community events organized in your co-living space?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to renew your membership in this co-living space?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale for retention insights. Include an 'N/A' option if needed.

script.question_text: How likely are you to renew your membership in this co-living space?

questions.question_text: What is your primary reason for choosing a co-living space over traditional housing?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with text input for diverse responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with optional open-text follow-up.

script.question_text: What is your primary reason for choosing a co-living space over traditional housing?
